Article.ArticleTitle: Nearly Complete Genome Sequence of Enterovirus Type A119 from Sewage in France in 2015.

Abstract.AbstractText: A nearly complete genome sequence of enterovirus type A119 was determined from an urban wastewater sample collected during a surveillance campaign in 2015 in Clermont-Ferrand, France. The partial VP1 sequence is a close relative of other partial enterovirus type A119 sequences detected in France and South Africa in the same year.
